Name: HMS Quentin
Displacement:
1,692 long tons (1,719 t)
2,411 long tons (2,450 t) full load
Propulsion: 2 × Admiralty three-drum boilers, Parsons geared steam turbines, 40,000 shp (30,000 kW) on 2 shafts
processing systems:
Radar Type 290 air warning
Radar Type 285 ranging & bearing
Armament:
4 × QF 4.7 in (119 mm) Mk.IX guns, single mounts CP Mk.XVIII
4 × QF 2 pdr Mk.VIII (40 mm L/39), quad mount Mk.VII
6 × QF 20 mm Oerlikon, single mount P Mk.III
8 (2×4) tubes for 21 in (533 mm) torpedoes Mk.IX
up to 3 × throwers & 3 × racks, to 45 depth charges
